(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NN Anyone))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ has)
            (VP (VBN been)
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP US))))))))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB know)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP what))
          (S
            (NP (DT a) (JJ typical) (NNP American) (NNP Steakhouse))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADJP (JJ like)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(know-9, Anyone-1)
nsubj(been-4, who-2)
aux(been-4, has-3)
rcmod(Anyone-1, been-4)
prep(been-4, to-5)
det(US-7, the-6)
pobj(to-5, US-7)
aux(know-9, would-8)
root(ROOT-0, know-9)
dobj(like-16, what-10)
det(Steakhouse-14, a-11)
amod(Steakhouse-14, typical-12)
nn(Steakhouse-14, American-13)
nsubj(like-16, Steakhouse-14)
cop(like-16, is-15)
ccomp(know-9, like-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (JJ Dark) (NN wood))
    (VP (VBZ furniture))
    (, ,)))


amod(wood-2, Dark-1)
nsubj(furniture-3, wood-2)
root(ROOT-0, furniture-3)

    (VP (VBZ knives))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (NP (JJ charred) (NNS steaks))
    (ADVP (RB typically))
    (VP (VBD served)
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (JJ creamed) (NN spinach)
          (CC and)
          (JJ thick) (NN cut) (NNS fries))))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB where))
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (VBD had)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (CD 55) (NN day))
            (ADJP (JJ dry) (VBN aged))))))
    (VP (VBD USDA)
      (NP (JJ prime) (NN ribeye) (NN steak))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Dave) (NNP Burg) (POS 's))
          (NN Primehouse))))
    (. .)))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHNP (WP What))
    (S
      (NP (NNP CUT))
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (VP (VBN done)
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP (PRP$ their) (NN bone) (NN marrow) (NN dish)))
          (ADVP (RB instead))))
      (, ,))))
